gameDetails.name: Arkham Horror: Kingsport Horror Expansion
gameDetails.description:
A big-box expansion for Arkham Horror, and is a part of the Arkham Horror Series.  The Great Old Ones return to Massachusetts and this time they are unleashing their monsters on Kingsport.  Join new investigators to combat new creatures before battling a new Ancient One.  Can you save the world before they stir in their slumber....

Kingsport includes a new board featuring the town of Kingsport, 8 Investigators, 4 new Ancient Ones, 2 Heralds, 3 Guardians (like Heralds, but helpful rather than hurtful) and tons of cards and monsters.
